q: Some alumni, current students, and faculty have voiced their disappointment with the high school's decision to honor Donald Rumsfeld . "He is a liar and war monger," wrote one woman on the New Trier Alumni Against Donald Rumsfeld 's "Achievement Award' Facebook page. However, the school cites Donald Rumsfeld "s 50 years of public service and his philanthropic contributions through the Donald Rumsfeld Foundation. But maybe the bigger controversy? he concluded. All of this is true, but replacing Eric Schmidt with Page is not necessarily the answer, said Seth Harris Dalka, a digital strategy consultant and keynote speaker. Ideally, Google needed to bring an executive that understood search and how that related to the businesses that they serve and their customer service, he told the E-Commerce Times. Yahoo( Nasdaq: YHOO), he pointed out, had a go at bringing back a founder as CEO, and it didn't exactly lead to optimal results.
